title: What are all the different types of property? - Quora

response.answer_text: Those which belong to the government.Abandoned ones.Those that are developed.Amusement parks.Apple, Inc. campuses.Fabulous ones.Microsoft Corp. campuses.Properties that are included in this classification.Wynn casinos.Starbucks locations.Modern art museums.Et cetera.Those that have just broken your budget.Those which at a distance resemble Japanese Tea Houses.With apologies to Borges.

Property generally includes "real" such as land, "public" such as your local park, "collective" such as the beach owned by your homeowners association, "personal" sometimes futher divided between "tangible" such as your household goods and "intangible" such as your stocks and bonds, and "intellectual" such as the novel you wrote. [Interestingly, law recognizes no "property rights" in your own organs while in your body (for example your liver) theoretically defended as preventing a market in body parts; but does admit rights to body parts outside your body, such as eggs or sperm harvested for storage and possible later use!]
